ParticleSynthesis.title: Particle Synthesis
ParticleSynthesis.description: We offer already synthesized particles of your choice (e.g. vaterite) with specific size and quantity. Contact us for more details.

ProtocolDevelopment.title: Protocol Development
ProtocolDevelopment.description: In case specific particles are needed and synthesis protocols are unavailable, we offer development of Reactor CR-1B protocols for such particle synthesis. Contact us for more details.

about.title: A Few Words About Us
about.description: Tetraquant is a Skolkovo startup company founded in 2019 by scientists and engineers from Skolkovo Institute of Science and Technology with interdisciplinary background to produce tools and equipment that they have relied on routinely and now aim to help other scientists to make their laboratory tasks easier and with great reproducibility of results.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.address: Skolkovo Innovation Center, Bolshoy Boulevard 30, bld. 1, Moscow, Russia 121205
